title: Veggie's
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Salad bar, Take-out
description: Vegan restaurant linked to a health food store. Offers lunch only and includes organic salad bar, entree of the day, haystacks, soup, smoothies and juices, and vegan baked goods. The store stocks nutritional supplements, some fresh produce, frozen food, spices, body care products, snacks, small bulk section. Hosts vegetarian cooking classes and seminars. Previously known as Brookview Cafe and Veggies Inc Store. Store hours: Sun 12-5pm, Mon-Thur 9am-6pm, Fri 9am-5pm, closed Sat.
